entry.title: End of The Line: Chris
entry.summary:
Author: Spacers24

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,245Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: He heard Buck soft footsteps approach him, “Hey Chris, what do you want to do today?” Buck smiles at him, though his smile looks a little tight.  “I want to see the sea!” Chris has been longing to go to the pier, unfortunately his dad has been very busy as of late. So maybe Buck can go with him?.  Buck's smile turns wider as he ruffles Chris' hair, “okay, we can do that. But have you eaten breakfast yet?” Chris shook his head, Dad overslept this morning and is in a rush trying to find someone to take care of Chris all the while packing both his and Chris’s bag. So unfortunately, they both missed breakfast.  Buck stands up, “well we can't have that” he moves toward the kitchen. “Do you have any requests?”  “Ice cream!” Chris immediately said.  “We can't have ice cream for breakfast Chris.” Chris pouted, which just made Buck laugh.” Tell you what, how about we eat some real breakfast now. And then when we go to the pier we can get ice cream?” Chris perked up and nodded, “Yes! Thank you Buck”  =========== The events of End of the Line, through Chris eyes.

entry.title: Eddie Diaz versus Buck's "Chopped and Unc" Hinge Date
entry.summary:
Author: buckasagirl

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,966Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 66

Summary: Eddie: What do you know about Buck’s date tonight?Ravi: They’re going to some Greek place.Ravi: And he’s kinda ugly.“Oh this guy… sucks,” Ravi says.“What have I been telling you this whole time?” Eddie throws his hands up dramatically.“I liked you better when you were straight and sad all the time.” He pulls his laptop closer to himself and away from Eddie’s hands, “Now you’re evil and gay.”“I’ll try not to live my truth and embrace joy next time if that makes you feel better.” Eddie reaches to pick up the laptop from Ravi’s lap, but he holds it out of Eddie’s reach before he can. Or, Eddie assembles a team to cyber-stalk Buck's Hinge date. It gets a little out of hand when they discover things they probably never should have seen.

entry.title: I’m a fire (and I’ll keep your brittle heart warm)
entry.summary:
Author: buckseddiediaz

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,827Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 53

Summary: “Does it- is it working?” Eddie said, sounding out of breath for a reason that Buck couldn’t figure out. Buck nodded, causing the water to ripple around his neck. “A little,” he started, “Usually have to massage it to get the blood flowing, though.” Eddie’s eyes narrowed on Buck, like he was stopping himself from making a terrible mistake, before Buck felt a firm but gentle hand on his left leg, “Like this?” he asked. Eddie’s thumb began to press into Buck’s leg, rubbing light circles into his flesh. Or; Buck’s leg has been bothering him more than he’d care to admit and Eddie helps him out: what happens when two best friends sit half naked in a hot tub together?

entry.title: Wanted: One Cookie Bandit (My Cookie Bandit)
entry.summary:
Author: edmundodiazjr

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 597Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 35

Summary: “Really?” he groaned. Eddie chewed, head dipping. “What? I needed sugar.” “It’s two in the morning, Eddie! I gave you a whole stack yesterday.” Eddie swallowed hard, sheepish. “I… wanted a fresh stack.” He said it like that was a completely rational reason to break in. A pout formed—not dramatic, just that tiny dip in his mouth that always hit Buck like a lightning strike. The affectionate kind. Buck dragged a hand down his face. “There’s a Seven-Eleven literally around the corner from your place.” Eddie reached into the cookie jar—Buck’s cookie jar, handmade snickerdoodles and all—and took another cookie. OR: Eddie needs sugar, so he went to Buck for sugar.

entry.title: Second Chances
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 367,098Chapters: 45/?Kudos: 59

Summary: Bobby and Athena are just two people trying to put their lives back together while figuring out how to co-parent. What starts as a complicated plan to foster kids in need slowly turns into something much deeper. Through the ups and downs of heartbreak, healing, and raising children who’ve been through so much, they find strength in each other. Over time, their partnership grows into love, and together, they build a story about family, trust, and second chances.

entry.title: How it Really Happened
entry.summary:
Author: naenae1985

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,269Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 9

Summary: “Please…”, he hears himself whine in a tone that he’s never heard before. What is wrong with him? “Please, what, baby? Tell me what you want.” Evan says, almost mockingly as continues to slowly stroke, squeezing every few strokes to do nothing more than make Tommy lose his mind. “Please…more. I, fuck, Evan, need more”, he says breathily, barely able to get out the words. Evan’s light touches drive him more and more out of his mind with arousal. Or Buck has always had complicated relationships. He knows this one will be just as complicated, if not more than others, but he also knows it will be worth every bit. Thinking about the past leads into the future and he realizes he's excited about what has yet to come.

entry.title: what is dead is restless & what is living is burning
entry.summary:
Author: bugbugly

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,835Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 3

Summary: She slips her index finger into the small gap in the gauze and gently slides it down, revealing a marred cheek, crude stitches crossing it diagonally, edged with inflammatory swelling. Brown, clotted blood is attempting to scab. Rust-eaten metal, Maddie thinks. & Kintsugi, Buck is pretty sure it’s called. The Japanese art of mending a broken thing to make it beautiful again, or beautiful like it never was before. In other words, Buck was put together long before he was ever broken.

entry.title: Cariño, You’re safe
entry.summary:
Author: buddieblues

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,985Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 72

Summary: Buck squeezes his eyes shut, shaking harder.“I can’t lose you,” he says softly. “I can’t. I can’t.”Eddie’s heart cracks open.“Cariño,” he says gently, “you’re not going to.”OrIt’s 3:06 a.m. and Buck can’t breathe, can’t think, and is convinced the world is ending if he doesn’t see Eddie. Panic attacks, whispered confessions, messy hair, tears, and one very patient firefighter later, Eddie proves he’s not going anywhere. Buck learns what it feels like to finally, finally be safe.

entry.title: Unconditional Love
entry.summary:
Author: villayuly1987

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,800Chapters: 25/?Kudos: 32

Summary: Evan is Bobby’s biological son from a previous marriage; Athena is his stepmother)This story is set six months after a major virus exposure. Eddie has returned home from Texas to help out Chimney, who is temporarily stepping in as captain of the 118 firehouse while the actual captain, Bobby, is in a medically induced coma fighting the virus.During the six months apart, Eddie and Evan grew incredibly close, leading to a secret relationship between them. Evan is struggling significantly with his father's condition, spending almost all his time at the hospital, barely sleeping or eating. Eddie is actively trying to take care of him, even having to drag Evan out of the hospital to rest.

entry.title: keep me close (safe and sound)
entry.summary:
Author: Surakian

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,385Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 115

Summary: Just before Buck thinks he’ll fall back asleep again, he feels the hand in his hair pull away, then brush delicately against his brow, across his birthmark, and then through the haze of repose… “Marry me.” “Huh?” Buck’s eyes pop wide open. He looks up at Eddie, whose eyes seem to have turned into molten honey as they gaze deep into Buck’s blue eyes. The combination of his exhaustion and all of his feelings for Eddie makes Buck wonder if it has all come together to make him hallucinate hearing— “Marry me, Evan.” Eddie says, more emphasis in the words this time, leaving no question to what is being said.Eddie gets injured during a call. When Buck awakens at Eddie's bedside at the hospital, it looks like Eddie has something important to tell him.

entry.title: So I told you that I was happy for you (And given the chance, I'd lie again)
entry.summary:
Author: MMMafterdark

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,678Chapters: 5/15Kudos: 6

Summary: Eddie’s just trying to fix his leaky kitchen sink when his sister bursts in waving her phone, yelling about a viral TikTok. What she shows him stops him cold: Buck, on stage, cowboy hat tipped low, singing a heartbreak song. What follows is a spectacular mix of bad timing, mutual pining, and emotional repression so thick it should come with a warning label. Both men are forced to face the feelings they’ve been pretending don’t exist—Buck’s for the man he thinks he can’t have, and Eddie’s for the truth he’s spent his whole life running from. Or: Eddie sees a TikTok of his best friend singing about heartbreak, and suddenly the closet isn’t just cracked- it’s shattered glass.

entry.title: make our wishes come true
entry.summary:
Author: mielydrama

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,022Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 14

Summary: Eddie Diaz is the picture-perfect boy scout. The favorite. His hair is always ideally slicked, like he wasn't inside the woods the entire day. His band bursts with the enormous amount of badges. His uniform is always stupidly clean, with an earthy smell that makes everyone feel ridiculously dizzy when he walks among them. His face matches with all his perfect mannerisms and acts and ass-licking to get more and more badges. Buck is done with all of that bullshit. His eyes glint with mischief when he sees Eddie's inflated mattress floating down the water, each second more further and further. OR Buck doesn't like almost-troup-leader Eddie Diaz. He needs to do something about it, so the best way to go for him is pranking him.It's not so good when they both get detention together and they have to miss the event of the summer: a meteor rain.

entry.title: Two More Little Lines
entry.summary:
Author: WellHelloHello

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,469Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 20

Summary: As soon as she got home she did all four tests and set a timer on her phone. She paced around, too anxious to stand still, waiting for the results. It wasn’t that she was scared because she didn’t want a kid, she was scared because she might have to seriously sit down and make some extremely difficult decisions.Eventually the timer went so she walked over to the bathroom counter, looking down at all four tests.Positive.There were four positives.orBuck's first pregnancy hadn't been the smoothest, but number two is far, far worse.

entry.title: Love Is Never Logical
entry.summary:
Author: ilove911

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,903Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 35

Summary: Before Buck could even think Eddie was turning his back on him and storming back out of the locker room, letting the door slam behind him. Buck stood there, dumbfound. He just stared at the door Eddie had slammed. He couldn’t understand why he was so mad. If it had been Eddie who had seen the hand at the window Buck had zero doubt that Eddie would do the exact same thing. Throwing Christopher in this too made Buck join Eddie in being mad. At least now they were pissed together. Or: 5 times Buck and Eddie don't communicate their emotions and the 1 time they share a little too much.

entry.title: It's Just a Number (It's Not Just a Number)
entry.summary:
Author: Bubblezzx88

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 113,818Chapters: 8/14Kudos: 157

Summary: “First, you pack up at the house and don’t tell me, and now you just sneak in here and hope no one sees you?” Eddie asked, hurt. Buck felt himself tense up at the pain he caused his best friend.“It’s tragic, isn’t it? I can’t even face the people who matter to me,” Buck told him. He turned to look at Eddie.Eddie was leaning against the door frame, and Ravi started to walk out. “No, you stay,” Eddie said sternly as he looked at Ravi.Ravi looked between them and didn’t know what to do. He leaned back against the locker. Buck let out a frustrated sigh. “What, now?” Buck asked angrily.“You think that no one wants to say goodbye? You just left the group chat like it was nothing. You gave your transfer request to the interim Captain after Gerrard left, like it was nothing. No one knows how to talk to you, Buck. You just cut everyone off.” Eddie said. But Buck didn’t cut everyone off, no, he just started talking less, he just hoped no one noticed, but of course Eddie did. Eddie always noticed when Buck self-isolated.Or, what happens when Buck moves out, leaves the 118, and ghosts Eddie Diaz?
